/** * Therapist Finder Component - Placeholder for compilation * This component helps users find and connect with mental health professionals */ import React from 'react'; export interface TherapistFinderProps { location?: string; _specialty?: string; _insuranceAccepted?: string[]; } export default function TherapistFinder({ location, _specialty, _insuranceAccepted }: TherapistFinderProps) { return (

Find Professional Support

Connect with qualified mental health professionals who understand your needs

{/* Search Filters */}

Search Filters

{/* Results */}

Available Therapists

ðŸ‘©â€âš•ï¸

Dr. Sarah Johnson

Licensed Clinical Psychologist

Anxiety & Depression Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
â­ 4.9 (127 reviews) ðŸ“ Downtown Seattle
ðŸ‘¨â€âš•ï¸

Dr. Michael Chen

Licensed Marriage & Family Therapist

Trauma & PTSD EMDR Therapy
â­ 4.8 (89 reviews) ðŸ“ Bellevue
{/* Call to Action */}

Don't see what you're looking for?

Our care coordinators can help you find the perfect therapist match

); } export { TherapistFinder };

/** * Settings Component - Placeholder for compilation * This component manages user preferences and application settings */ import React from 'react'; export interface SettingsProps { _userId?: string; _section?: 'general' | 'privacy' | 'notifications' | 'accessibility'; } export default function Settings({ _userId, _section = 'general' }: SettingsProps) { return (

Settings

Customize your wellness experience and privacy preferences

{/* Navigation Sidebar */}

Categories

{/* Main Content */}
{/* General Settings Card */}

General Preferences

Customize your app experience

Switch between light and dark themes

Choose your preferred language

{/* Privacy Settings Card */}

Privacy & Security

Control how your data is used and shared

Help improve mental health research (_anonymized)

Help us improve the app experience

); } export { Settings };

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [computation, priority]
